**Tender Notice - PR10252 C1111-230132 Benchtop Fourier-Transform Infrared (FTIR) Microscope System**

**Publication Date:** 2024-05-15  
**Closing Date:** 2024-05-31T14:00:00  
**Procurement Reference:** WS4580420764-Doc4587363443  
**Type of Procurement:** Request for Proposal  
**Status:** Expired

**Objectives:**

The Canadian Conservation Institute (CCI) is seeking a supplier to provide One (1) Benchtop Fourier-Transform Infrared (FTIR) Microscope System. The system must be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario within 8 months after contract award. The procurement includes goods, accessories, installation, and training.

**Contract Details:**

* Duration: Contract period begins from the date of award and ends one (1) year after the date of acceptance
* Location: The contract goods will be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

**Pre-qualifications:**

Bidders must submit a proposal that meets the mandatory evaluation criteria and point-rated evaluation criteria outlined in Annex A, Part 2.1 and 2.2 of the Request for Proposal document.

**Debriefing:**

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the request for proposals process. Requests must be made within 15 working days of receiving the results. The debriefing may be conducted in writing, by telephone, or in person.

**Language:**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French). The contracting authority provides procurement services to the public in both official languages.

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the following free trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
